Title: Relates to conditional surrender of parental rights in family and surrogate's court
Summary: Relates to conditional surrender of parental rights in family and surrogate's court.
LawCode: Amd §112-b, Dom Rel L; amd §262, Fam Ct Act; amd §§383-c & 384, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, the family court act and the social services law, in relation to conditional surrenders of parental rights in family and surrogate's court
